entry.title: Dogecoin Surges on Reports Twitter Will Reconsider Elon Musk Buyout Offer
entry.summary: New reports suggest Elon Musk will acquire Twitter for $43 billion in cash. Following these reports, Dogecoin has since rallied.

entry.title: Shiba Inu Launches ‘Burning Portal’ to Reward SHIB Token Holders
entry.summary: A new burn portal now lets Shiba Inu token holders is incentivizing participants to cut the meme coin’s circulating supply.

entry.title: Zilliqa, NEAR Protocol Suffer Double-Digit Losses as Crypto Market Dips
entry.summary: As the broader cryptocurrency market bleeds red, several Layer-1 coins, like Zilliqa and Near, are facing significant losses.

entry.title: Grayscale Renews Push With SEC for Bitcoin Spot ETF
entry.summary: The Securities and Exchange Commission has so far approved only BTC futures ETFs.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: SEC Proposal Ruffles More Feathers, Bored Apes Back in Spotlight
entry.summary: Plus: NFT project Akutars got off to a calamitous start when $34 million was permanently locked into a faulty smart contract.

entry.title: Aku Ethereum NFT Launch Ends With $34M Locked in Flawed Smart Contract
entry.summary: Mistakes in the code for the prominent project launch mean that $34M worth of ETH is apparently inaccessible.

entry.title: Animoca Brands ‘Not Done Acquiring’ Studios to Make NFT Games: Chairman
entry.summary: The metaverse investor and NFT game publisher recently picked up three game developers—with potentially more to come.

entry.title: The Beijing Olympics Was the Coming Out Party for China’s Digital Yuan. What Comes Next?
entry.summary: China first considered a CBDC in 2014, ramping up research in 2019. Now it's live and in wide use, and could lead other countries to follow.

entry.title: NFT-Backed Film 'Project Iceman' Tracks Antarctica Triathlon Attempt of Anders Hofman
entry.summary: Documentary "Project Iceman" will be funded through NFT sales, after the producers turned down a $1.25 million offer from a streaming service.

entry.title: Coinbase Stock Hits All-Time Low After Ethereum NFT Marketplace Rollout
entry.summary: Since the launch, shares are down more than 15%. Since January, the stock has dropped more than 47%.

entry.title: We Need to Talk About Terra's Anchor
entry.summary: With roughly $16 billion in value on Terra’s Anchor, the project constitutes over half of all DeFi activity for the Terra ecosystem.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Back Below $40K, Markets Mostly Flat
entry.summary: Among the few leading coins to post gains were Apecoin, Monero, and Terra's Luna. Bitcoin Cash and Ethereum Classic each fell about 8%.

entry.title: Did Coinbase Blow Its NFT Launch? Not So Fast
entry.summary: Critics of Coinbase NFT say the exchange is too late to a now-crowded field. But it would be a mistake to dismiss Coinbase's effort.

entry.title: US Treasury Links More Ethereum Wallets to $622M Ronin Network Hack
entry.summary: Three additional wallets have been tied to North Korea’s Lazarus hacking group following March’s Axie Infinity sidechain attack.

entry.title: Binance Refutes Allegations It Shared User Data With Russian Intelligence
entry.summary: According to Reuters, Russian intelligence was trying to track Bitcoin sent to opposition leader Alexei Navalny.

entry.title: Nike and RTFKT Reveal CryptoKicks—Their First Ethereum NFT Metaverse Sneakers
entry.summary: The first Nike metaverse NFT wearables are now live, complete with style-changing Skin Vial NFTs.

entry.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'
entry.summary: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.

entry.title: Privacy Blockchain Findora Launches Ethereum-Based Testnet 'Yellow Submarine'
entry.summary: The new venture was built in collaboration with the Project Columbus DAO.

entry.title: Ukraine Bans Cryptocurrency Purchases in Local Currency
entry.summary: The central bank’s move is to stop “unproductive capital outflows.”

entry.title: Silk Road Bitcoin Stash Will Be Used to Pay Ross Ulbricht's $184 Million Fine
entry.summary: The government seized 69,730 Bitcoin from a Silk Road hacker back in 2013.

entry.title: MetaMask, Ethereum Apps Down as Infura Suffers Outage
entry.summary: Decentralized apps and services are widely impacted this morning due to shared infrastructure from Infura.

entry.title: Peter Thiel-Backed BitDAO Votes to Invest $6.5 Million Into Ethereum NFT Collective PleasrDAO
entry.summary: The DAO’s proposal to invest in the NFT acquisition collective passed unanimously.

entry.title: Payments Giant Stripe to Pilot Crypto Payouts With Twitter
entry.summary: Stripe continues its crypto endeavors with a new pilot program that will let some Twitter users get paid in the popular stablecoin USDC.

entry.title: Binance Recovers $5.8M From $622M Axie Infinity Bridge Theft
entry.summary: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao tweeted this morning that North Korean hackers attempted to channel the loot through "over 86 accounts" today.

entry.title: Tron's TRX Token Jumps 7% On News of Native Algorithmic Stablecoin
entry.summary: Following news that Tron plans to roll out a new algorithmic stablecoin, the network’s native token TRX has jumped more than 7%.

entry.title: Bitcoin Firm Crusoe Energy Raises $505 Million to Grow Flare-Gas Mining Business
entry.summary: Crusoe uses "digital flare mitigation" to repurpose untapped natural gas into electricity for Bitcoin mining.

entry.title: 'Alien' Director Ridley Scott to Produce Film About Ethereum's Rise
entry.summary: Camila Russo's "The Infinite Machine" has a movie deal.

entry.title: UFC Fighter Nate Diaz Hopes No One Buys His 'Bullshit' NFT
entry.summary: Diaz’s comments come at a time when sports leagues around the world are looking to capitalize on the NFT craze.

entry.title: Tron to Create Algorithmic Stablecoin to Be More Like Terra
entry.summary: It's also planning on raising $10 billion for a reserve fund.

entry.title: Paris Hilton Invests in Afterparty’s $4 Million Raise for Polygon NFT Ticketing
entry.summary: Afterparty is positioning itself to become the first go-to NFT ticketing site that offers fans extra perks.

entry.title: NBA Botches Ethereum NFT Drop as 'The Association' Suffers Exploit
entry.summary: Poor coding has resulted in some NBA fans losing out on the NFTs that they were promised. But the league says it will make it up to them.

entry.title: Monero Rallies 22% in a Week Amid Hard Fork Announcement and 'Monerun'
entry.summary: Privacy coin Monero is surging on news of an upcoming hard fork slated for July and a group of enthusiasts that stirred a crypto bank run.

entry.title: NEAR Lending Project Bastion Raises $9M Series A Led By Three Arrows
entry.summary: Bastion also is launching a governance token, BSTN, which was announced in March.

entry.title: Ethereum Earned Global Investors $76.3B in Realized Gains in 2021 Thanks to DeFi: Report
entry.summary: Powered by DeFi, Ethereum holders have raked in more realized gains than Bitcoin in 2021, according to a Chainalysis report.

entry.title: Kadena Establishes $100M Grant Program For Web3 Development
entry.summary: Kadena is seeking developers to build on its proof-of-work blockchain.

entry.title: Ethereum DeFi Project MetaLend Using NFT-Backed Loans to Grow Play-to-Earn Sector
entry.summary: The Web3 startup aims to give gamers a way to tap into new sources of liquidity: NFTs.

entry.title: British Department Store Harvey Nichols Opens NFT Space in Hong Kong
entry.summary: Current NFT owners are encouraged to exhibit and sell their NFTs in the space, but only “blue-chip” projects will be accepted.

entry.title: 0x Token Soars 53% Following Coinbase NFT Partnership
entry.summary: ZRX, the token underpinning the 0x protocol, is rallying on the back of the announcement of its partnership with Coinbase NFT.

entry.title: Binance Limits Crypto Services to Russian Users After EU’s Latest Sanctions Package
entry.summary: Crypto’s largest exchange has announced that it will restrict services to Russian users with more than €10,000 in their Binance accounts.

entry.title: Why Animoca Brands Invested More Money Into Axie Infinity Despite $622M Hack
entry.summary: Despite the massive hack and the play-to-earn game’s struggling economy, metaverse investor Animoca Brands remains bullish.

entry.title: US Government Sanctions Russian Bitcoin Miner
entry.summary: The Treasury department added Moscow-based BitRiver to its Specially Designated Nationals list.

entry.title: Astronaut Scott Kelly Discusses NFT Project, Crypto Holdings, and the Metaverse
entry.summary: Retired NASA astronaut Scott Kelly talks to Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward about his new Ethereum NFT collection, which benefits relief efforts in Ukraine, plus the cryptocurrencies he holds and his excitement about the metaverse.

entry.title: Gemini COO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022
entry.summary: Gemini COO Noah Perlman talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Gemini's approach to competing with other exchanges, its focus on regulatory compliance, and his own views on Bitcoin maximalists.

entry.title: Robinhood Crypto CTO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022
entry.summary: Robinhood Crypto CTO Johann Kerbrat talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Robinhood's new Lightning Network integration, potential NFT plans, and Kerbrat's personal history with crypto, including mining Bitcoin back in 2010.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 7: pplpleasr and the NFT Art Revolution
entry.summary: Emily Yang aka pplpleasr never thought she'd be an online celebrity. But in 2021 an NFT version of a digital ad she did for Uniswap sold for $525,000 to a DAO of her fans, and now she's among the most famous NFT artists. She speaks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the rise of NFT art, the traditional art world taking it seriously, NFT haters, and which NFT marketplaces can beat OpenSea.

entry.title: Ice Cube: Crypto and NFTs Are ‘The Ultimate Fuck You to the Mainstream’
entry.summary: The legendary rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Ice Cube talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about why his BIG3 basketball league plans to offer fractional team ownership in the form of NFTs, plus his personal interest in crypto.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto, Taxes, and You
entry.summary: Tax Day is coming, and the crypto world is paying attention. Decrypt's Jeff Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Adriana Hamacher discuss what people and businesses need to know about crypto and taxes with special guest Nicholas Mowbray of Baker Hostetler.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 6: Ditching Big Banks for Bitcoin With Caitlin Long
entry.summary: Caitlin Long spent nearly two decades at big banks Credit Suisse and Morgan Stanley before she went all in on Bitcoin. Now her company Custodia is seeking to offer banking services to crypto companies long shut out by the big banks. She talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about identifying as a Bitcoin maximalist, crypto regulation in DC, and Web3 culture.

entry.title: Crypto on the Campaign Trail: Matt West, Matthew Diemer, Tyler Lindholm at Camp Ethereal 2022
entry.summary: Politicians are embracing crypto on both sides of the aisle. Matt West, running for congress in Oregon, Matthew Diemer, running for congress in Ohio, and former Wyoming Rep. Tyler Lindholm discussed crypto and politics on a panel with Decrypt's Jeff Roberts at Camp Ethereal in Wyoming. As Diemer pointed out, "We have a conservative Republican, a progressive Democrat, and a moderate Democrat on the same stage, unified by crypto and the idea of making sensible regulation."

entry.title: Crypto Taxes Got You Down? Software Can Help
entry.summary: Tax season is upon us, and crypto investors have questions. Tony Dhanjal, Head of Tax at crypto tax software service Koinly, shares tips in this sponsored segment.
